metadata.name: Lego carpet (Transform 2)
metadata.description:
#Experimental research based transform art project

This work inspired from carpet shape , created by Lego pieces.
On this work I`m trying to display that the hard material (Lego piece because is rigid thing) can transform into the soft material.Shapes are moves like a soft carpet material and contains some raised artificial shapes.

We are able transform majority material to the another one.Research is still in progress about the transform .This is not just art it's research based transformer project that engage with each material transform into another one through art.But now engaging with especially Lego piece material.

From special carpet transform series 

Unique piece (hand work)

Medium-mixed technique on special prepared paper

Actual dimensions-27/11 Inch
